transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji bhai.
Executive: Ji good evening sir. Good evening Amrit baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Haan Amrit bhai kaise ho aap?
Executive: Kaise ho aap? Badhiya badhiya badhiya. Aapse meri baat last time jab hui thi to last me nahi ki mai baat kar raha hun jab hamari baat hui thi to aapne bola tha ek hi ek ki lead aati hai saffron saffron ki bahut jyada.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: To aur kisi ki lead hi nahi aati.
Executive: Yaad hai sir aapko? Nahi wo mujhe samajh samajh aa gayi aapki jo aapne bola tha na.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Maine wo ek do do product aur visible karwai fir maine unki leade uthai to wo visible ho gaye fir.
Executive: Ho gayi? Haan haan wo wo mujhe samajh aa gaya wo kya hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha to ab lead sari hai proper uski lead flow sahi hai?
Customer: Haan haan ab mujhe pata hai kya karna hai.
Executive: Okay okay and still abhi bhi dekhoge sir aap to pican nets ho gaya pican nets broken almond dry figs uske baad almond kernels hai uske baad almond oil macadia nuts inme abhi aap deal nahi kar rahe ho inme bhi aap utha nahi rahe ho ya apricot oil hai macadia nuts inme kya karna hai sir?
Customer: Nahi ye aise hi rakhte hain to hum deal kar rahe hain inme sabme.
Executive: To iski bhi lead uthao sir to iski bhi lead agar aap uthate ho to isme aapko lead milegi.
Customer: Haan haan wo kal.
Customer: Ek abhi hum thoda busy rehte hain na.
Executive: Achcha achcha to free kab rahoge aap?
Customer: Haan to kal haan ab hafta hafta lagbhag abhi busy hai to uske baad to usi ke sath hi rahna hai bas.
Customer: To mai call kab kar lu fir?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Mai yahan se call kar sakta hun na?
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Yahan se bhi yahan se bhi call kar sakta hun na aapko?
Executive: Haan bilkul bilkul call kar sakte ho mai na.
Customer: Koi nahi kal kal din me kal din me kar lenge kal din me kar lenge.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai din me aap call karo kuch aur bhi discuss karna hai mujhe iske regarding theek hai.
Executive: Haan bilkul bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Okay okay sir.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was receiving leads for only one product.

- Customer wants to discuss other products.



Resolution:

- Executive made other products visible.

- Customer confirmed lead flow is proper now.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call during the day tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product visibility, discussion
